template.name: Template VM VMware
template.description:
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/
Template tooling version used: 0.39

item.name: VMware: Event log
item.description: Collect VMware event log. See also: https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/5.0/manual/config/items/preprocessing/examples#filtering_vmware_event_log_records

item.name: VMware: Full name
item.description: VMware service full name.

item.name: VMware: Version
item.description: VMware service version.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Status of "{#CLUSTER.NAME}" cluster
item_prototype.description: VMware cluster status.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average read latency of the datastore {#DATASTORE}
item_prototype.description: Amount of time for a read operation from the datastore (milliseconds).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Free space on datastore {#DATASTORE} (percentage)
item_prototype.description: VMware datastore space in percentage from total.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Total size of datastore {#DATASTORE}
item_prototype.description: VMware datastore space in bytes.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average write latency of the datastore {#DATASTORE}
item_prototype.description: Amount of time for a write operation to the datastore (milliseconds).

item.name: VMware: Cluster name
item.description: Cluster name of the guest VM.

item.name: VMware: CPU latency in percents
item.description: Percentage of time the virtual machine is unable to run because it is contending for access to the physical CPU(s).

item.name: VMware: Number of virtual CPUs
item.description: Number of virtual CPUs assigned to the guest.

item.name: VMware: CPU readiness latency in percents
item.description: Percentage of time that the virtual machine was ready, but could not get scheduled to run on the physical CPU.

item.name: VMware: CPU ready
item.description: Time that the virtual machine was ready, but could not get scheduled to run on the physical CPU during last measurement interval (VMware vCenter/ESXi Server performance counter sampling interval - 20 seconds)

item.name: VMware: CPU swap-in latency in percents
item.description: Percentage of CPU time spent waiting for swap-in.

item.name: VMware: CPU usage in percents
item.description: CPU usage as a percentage during the interval.

item.name: VMware: CPU usage
item.description: Current upper-bound on CPU usage. The upper-bound is based on the host the virtual machine is current running on, as well as limits configured on the virtual machine itself or any parent resource pool. Valid while the virtual machine is running.

item.name: VMware: Datacenter name
item.description: Datacenter name of the guest VM.

item.name: VMware: Guest memory swapped
item.description: Amount of guest physical memory that is swapped out to the swap space.

item.name: VMware: Uptime of guest OS
item.description: Total time elapsed since the last operating system boot-up (in seconds).

item.name: VMware: Hypervisor name
item.description: Hypervisor name of the guest VM.

item.name: VMware: Ballooned memory
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory that is currently reclaimed through the balloon driver.

item.name: VMware: Compressed memory
item.description: The amount of memory currently in the compression cache for this VM.

item.name: VMware: Host memory consumed
item.description: Amount of host physical memory consumed for backing up guest physical memory pages.

item.name: VMware: Private memory
item.description: Amount of memory backed by host memory and not being shared.

item.name: VMware: Shared memory
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory shared through transparent page sharing.

item.name: VMware: Swapped memory
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory swapped out to the VM's swap device by ESX.

item.name: VMware: Guest memory usage
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory that is being used by the VM.

item.name: VMware: Host memory usage
item.description: The amount of host physical memory allocated to the VM, accounting for saving from memory sharing with other VMs.

item.name: VMware: Memory size
item.description: Total size of configured memory.

item.name: VMware: Host memory usage in percents
item.description: Percentage of host physical memory that has been consumed.

item.name: VMware: Power state
item.description: The current power state of the virtual machine.

item.name: VMware: Committed storage space
item.description: Total storage space, in bytes, committed to this virtual machine across all datastores.

item.name: VMware: Uncommitted storage space
item.description: Additional storage space, in bytes, potentially used by this virtual machine on all datastores.

item.name: VMware: Unshared storage space
item.description: Total storage space, in bytes, occupied by the virtual machine across all datastores, that is not shared with any other virtual machine.

item.name: VMware: Uptime
item.description: System uptime.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Number of bytes received on interface {#IFDESC}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine network interface input statistics (bytes per second).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Number of packets received on interface {#IFDESC}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine network interface input statistics (packets per second).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Number of bytes transmitted on interface {#IFDESC}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine network interface output statistics (bytes per second).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Number of packets transmitted on interface {#IFDESC}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine network interface output statistics (packets per second).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Network utilization on interface {#IFDESC}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine network utilization (combined transmit-rates and receive-rates) during the interval.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average number of outstanding read requests to the disk {#DISKDESC}
item_prototype.description: Average number of outstanding read requests to the virtual disk during the collection interval.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average read latency to the disk {#DISKDESC}
item_prototype.description: The average time a read from the virtual disk takes.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average write latency to the disk {#DISKDESC}
item_prototype.description: The average time a write to the virtual disk takes.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average number of outstanding write requests to the disk {#DISKDESC}
item_prototype.description: Average number of outstanding write requests to the virtual disk during the collection interval.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average number of bytes read from the disk {#DISKDESC}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine disk device read statistics (bytes per second).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average number of reads from the disk {#DISKDESC}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine disk device read statistics (operations per second).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average number of bytes written to the disk {#DISKDESC}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine disk device write statistics (bytes per second).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average number of writes to the disk {#DISKDESC}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine disk device write statistics (operations per second).

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of all guest file systems.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Free disk space on {#FSNAME}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine file system statistics (bytes).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Free disk space on {#FSNAME} (percentage)
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine file system statistics (percentages).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Total disk space on {#FSNAME}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine total disk space (bytes).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Used disk space on {#FSNAME}
item_prototype.description: VMware virtual machine used disk space (bytes).

item.name: VMware: Hypervisor ping
item.description: Checks if the hypervisor is running and accepting ICMP pings.

trigger.name: VMware: Hypervisor is down
trigger.description: The service is unavailable or does not accept ICMP ping.

item.name: VMware: Cluster name
item.description: Cluster name of the guest VM.

item.name: VMware: CPU usage in percents
item.description: CPU usage as a percentage during the interval.

item.name: VMware: CPU usage
item.description: Aggregated CPU usage across all cores on the host in Hz. This is only available if the host is connected.

item.name: VMware: CPU utilization
item.description: CPU usage as a percentage during the interval depends on power management or HT.

item.name: VMware: Datacenter name
item.description: Datacenter name of the hypervisor.

item.name: VMware: Full name
item.description: The complete product name, including the version information.

item.name: VMware: CPU frequency
item.description: The speed of the CPU cores. This is an average value if there are multiple speeds. The product of CPU frequency and number of cores is approximately equal to the sum of the MHz for all the individual cores on the host.

item.name: VMware: CPU model
item.description: The CPU model.

item.name: VMware: CPU cores
item.description: Number of physical CPU cores on the host. Physical CPU cores are the processors contained by a CPU package.

item.name: VMware: CPU threads
item.description: Number of physical CPU threads on the host.

item.name: VMware: Total memory
item.description: The physical memory size.

item.name: VMware: Model
item.description: The system model identification.

item.name: VMware: Bios UUID
item.description: The hardware BIOS identification.

item.name: VMware: Vendor
item.description: The hardware vendor identification.

item.name: VMware: Ballooned memory
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory that is currently reclaimed through the balloon driver. Sum of all guest VMs.

item.name: VMware: Used memory
item.description: Physical memory usage on the host.

item.name: VMware: Number of bytes received
item.description: VMware hypervisor network input statistics (bytes per second).

item.name: VMware: Number of bytes transmitted
item.description: VMware hypervisor network output statistics (bytes per second).

item.name: VMware: Power usage maximum allowed
item.description: Maximum allowed power usage.

item.name: VMware: Power usage
item.description: Current power usage.

item.name: VMware: Health state rollup
item.description: The host health state rollup sensor value: gray - unknown, green - ok, red - it has a problem, yellow - it might have a problem.

trigger.name: VMware: The {$VMWARE.HV.UUID} health is Red
trigger.description: One or more components in the appliance might be in an unusable status and the appliance might become unresponsive soon. Security patches might be available.

trigger.name: VMware: The {$VMWARE.HV.UUID} health is Yellow
trigger.description: One or more components in the appliance might become overloaded soon.

item.name: VMware: Overall status
item.description: The overall alarm status of the host: gray - unknown, green - ok, red - it has a problem, yellow - it might have a problem.

trigger.name: VMware: The {$VMWARE.HV.UUID} health is Red
trigger.description: One or more components in the appliance might be in an unusable status and the appliance might become unresponsive soon. Security patches might be available.

trigger.name: VMware: The {$VMWARE.HV.UUID} health is Yellow
trigger.description: One or more components in the appliance might become overloaded soon.

item.name: VMware: Uptime
item.description: System uptime.

item.name: VMware: Version
item.description: Dot-separated version string.

item.name: VMware: Number of guest VMs
item.description: Number of guest virtual machines.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Multipath count for datastore {#DATASTORE}
item_prototype.description: Number of available datastore paths.

trigger_prototype.name: VMware: The multipath count has been changed
trigger_prototype.description: The number of available datastore paths less than registered ({#MULTIPATH.COUNT}).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average read latency of the datastore {#DATASTORE}
item_prototype.description: Average amount of time for a read operation from the datastore (milliseconds).

item_prototype.name: VMware: Free space on datastore {#DATASTORE} (percentage)
item_prototype.description: VMware datastore space in percentage from total.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Total size of datastore {#DATASTORE}
item_prototype.description: VMware datastore space in bytes.

item_prototype.name: VMware: Average write latency of the datastore {#DATASTORE}
item_prototype.description: Average amount of time for a write operation to the datastore (milliseconds).

macro.description: VMware service (vCenter or ESX hypervisor) SDK URL (https://servername/sdk)
